attributes.action: Ban the new Sony PlayStation game - Detroit: Becoming human
attributes.background: This game supports and promotes domestic violence, child abuse and murder. Games are something that allows children to escape into "their own little world" what will this game do to them? Either remind them of their current lifestyle or generate the killers and abusers of tomorrow!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for banning specific games. That's the responsibility of the Video Standards Council, which is responsible in the UK for implementing the PEGI age rating system which is used in over 30 countries throughout Europe.

You can find out more here:

http://videostandards.org.uk/Home/
